entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C

Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
